Title: LimitlessLightSwitch - Control your LimitlessLED bulbs
Description: LimitlessLightSwitch is a windows phone application that allows the user to control LimitlessLED RGBW lightbulbs with their mobile device.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
LimitlessLightSwitch is a windows phone application that allows the user to control LimitlessLED RGBW lightbulbs with their mobile device.


Additional Information
LimitlessLED bulbs are 2.4GHz RF-controlled light bulbs, that, in combination with a wifi-bridge, can be controlled by this application. It makes use of a connector library, which can be found under related projects.
